	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}

		}
		event_background = gallows

		}
		event_background = bedchamber

			scope:locale = flag:study

		event_background = study
	}

		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}

		character = root
		animation = shame
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = scheme

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}

				no_clothes
			}

			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}

		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.4.desc.1
		}

			trigger = {
				scope:subdom > -10

			}
			desc = LIDAc.4.desc.2
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.4.desc.3
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 15
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 15
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.3
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 4
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

	}

LIDAc.3 = {
	# FM_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB: Down the Gullet
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.3.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {

		event_background = market

		}

	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = shame
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = schadenfreude

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {

		}

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition

			}

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -11001000
				}
				# 11001000: EventsSex.FM_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_SUB failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you push and try to stop his thrusts. It's all in vain, however, as he ignores you.\n
				desc = sex_transition.11.10.666
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 10
			}
			# defaulted to 10000310: EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.FM_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			desc = sex_transition.10.3.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 11
			}
			# defaulted to 11000310: EventsSex.FM_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsCum.FM_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			desc = sex_transition.11.3.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.3.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.3.desc.1
		}
		desc = LIDAc.3.desc.2
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.3.desc.3
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.3.desc.4
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.3.desc.5
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 20
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 20
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.5
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 3
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

	# FM_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS: More Icing on the Cake

			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}

		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {

		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {

		}

		}

				}

				# "Not inside!" you barely blurt out between moans and labored breaths.\n

				scope:subdom >= 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.7.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom > -10 
scope:subdom < 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.7.desc.2
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.7.desc.3
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.7.desc.4
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.7.desc.5
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0.3
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.8
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

	# FM_CREAMPIE_BREED: Something to Remember Him By
	type = character_event

	theme = seduction

			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield

		}

	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = worry
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}

				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = personality_bold
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}

		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 17001110
				}
				# Lie on Back
				# His rod gets even harder as his relentless pounding reaches your deepest spot, #bold drowning#! your thoughts in euphoria.\n

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 18001110
				}

				# His rod gets even harder as his relentless pounding reaches your deepest spot, #bold drowning#! your thoughts in euphoria.\n
				desc = sex_transition.18.11.0
			}

					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -17001600

				# You grab [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] as he's recovering from a thrust and manage to get on your side, but he grabs and puts you back down.\n
				desc = sex_transition.17.16.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -17000810
				}
				# 17000810: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.FM_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# "Not inside!" you barely blurt out between moans and labored breaths, but your pleas falls on deaf ears.\n
				desc = sex_transition.17.8.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -17001210
				}
				# 17001210: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_KEEP failed
				# You try to wrap your legs and arms around him, but his wild thrusting makes it impossible to hold on.\n
				desc = sex_transition.17.12.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -18001700
				}
				# 18001700: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY failed
				# You try to roll in place, but [affairs_partner.GetFirstName]'s #bold paralyzing#! barrage of thrusts never slows enough to do so.\n
				desc = sex_transition.18.17.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -18000900
				}
				# 18000900: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.FM_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND failed
				# You try to find a moment to pull your knees under you, but each attempt is thwarted by his wild thrashing.\n
				desc = sex_transition.18.9.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -18000810
				}
				# 18000810: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.FM_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# "D-Don't fill me!" you shakingly say as his pounding nearly drives you senseless, but your pleas falls on deaf ears.\n
				desc = sex_transition.18.8.666
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 17
			}
			# defaulted to 17001110: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_BREED
			desc = sex_transition.17.11.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 18
			}
			# defaulted to 18001110: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_BREED
			desc = sex_transition.18.11.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.11.desc.0
		desc = LIDAc.11.desc.1
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.2
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub

			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.3
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {

			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.4
		}

			trigger = {

			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.5
		}

			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.6
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 20
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.7
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10

			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.8
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10

			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.9
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.10
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -20
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.11
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10

			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.12
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10 
NOT = { has_trait =lida_sub }
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.13
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.14
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom 
 NOT = { has_trait =pregnant }
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.15
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom 
 has_trait = pregnant
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.16
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				NOT = { has_trait =pregnant } 
 NOT = { has_trait =lida_sub } 
 NOT = { has_trait =lida_dom }
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.17
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait =pregnant 
 NOT = { has_trait =lida_sub } 
 NOT = { has_trait =lida_dom }
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.18
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -6
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 45.0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 45
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 45
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.11
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

		event_background = sitting_room

				}

				# "Not inside!" you barely blurt out between moans and labored breaths, but your pleas falls on deaf ears.\n

				# You try to wrap your legs and arms around him, but his wild thrusting makes it impossible to hold on.\n
				desc = sex_transition.17.12.666
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {

				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 17
			}
			# defaulted to 17001210: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_KEEP

		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0

				has_trait = lida_dom
			}

		}

			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 60
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 20
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 20
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.12
	}

		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 12
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}

LIDAc.13 = {
	# MF_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND: A Load in Hand is Worth Two in the Bush
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.13.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = boredom
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = shame
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 24001310
				}
				# Handjob
				# You place your palm below his cock, ready to receive his seed.\n
				desc = sex_transition.24.13.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 27001310
				}
				# Sub Blowjob
				# Pulling away, you deprive him of the warmth of your mouth.\n
				desc = sex_transition.27.13.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -24002400
				}
				# 24002400: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB failed
				# 
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = { has_trait = lida_dom }
					}
					desc = sex_transition.24.24.0
				}
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait = lida_dom
					}
					desc = sex_transition.24.24.1
				}
				desc = sex_transition.24.24.2
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -24001710
				}
				# 24001710: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB -> EventsCum.MF_RUINED_ORGASM failed
				# You move to stop his climax, but realize that he did not last as long as you expected.\n
				desc = sex_transition.24.17.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -24001310
				}

				# You place your palm below his cock, ready to receive his seed, but his tip seems to be pointing elsewhere...\n
				desc = sex_transition.24.13.666
			}

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -27002500
				}

				desc = sex_transition.27.25.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -27001310
				}
				# 27001310: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND failed
				# Try as you might, [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] stops you from pulling away.\n
				desc = sex_transition.27.13.666
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 24
			}
			# defaulted to 24001310: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB -> EventsCum.MF_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND

			}

		}

		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.13.desc.1
		}

			trigger = {
				scope:subdom > -10

			}
			desc = LIDAc.13.desc.2
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.13.desc.3
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 20
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 20
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.13
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 13
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

				# 27002500: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you attempt to curb his thrusts. However, on your knees beneath him, you don't have enough leverage to forcefully stop him and he seems to have no intention of letting you back in control.\n
				desc = sex_transition.27.25.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -27001310
				}
				# 27001310: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND failed
				# Try as you might, [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] stops you from pulling away.\n
				desc = sex_transition.27.13.666
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 24
			}
			# defaulted to 24001610: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
			desc = sex_transition.24.16.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 25
			}
			# defaulted to 25001610: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
			desc = sex_transition.25.16.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 27
			}
			# defaulted to 27001610: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
			desc = sex_transition.27.16.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_m
		}
		desc = LIDAc.16.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.16.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom > -10 
scope:subdom < 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.16.desc.2
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.16.desc.3
		}
		desc = LIDAc.16.desc.4
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.16.desc.5
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				NOT = { has_trait = lida_dom } 
 NOT = { has_trait = lida_sub }
			}
			desc = LIDAc.16.desc.6
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.16.desc.7
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 15
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 15
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.15
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 16
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = schadenfreude
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = disgust
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 25001410
				}
				# Dom Blowjob
				# You prepare to wring him dry with your dexterous tongue.\n
				desc = sex_transition.25.14.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -25002400
				}
				# 25002400: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB failed
				# The potent musk of his member, inflated by the proximity of your nose to his groin, strangely captivates you and you lose this opportunity to assert more dominance.\n
				desc = sex_transition.25.24.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -25002500
				}
				# 25002500: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# The incessant invasion of his member down your throat momentarily puts you in a trance, leaving the initiative in his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition.25.25.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -25001710
				}
				# 25001710: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.MF_RUINED_ORGASM failed
				# As you try to pull back, he holds the back of your head with his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition.25.17.666
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 25
			}
			# defaulted to 25001410: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_DOM
			desc = sex_transition.25.14.0
		}

				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_m
		}
		desc = LIDAc.14.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.14.desc.1
		}

			trigger = {
				scope:subdom > -10

			}

		}

			trigger = {

			}
			desc = LIDAc.14.desc.3
		}
		desc = LIDAc.14.desc.4
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {

			}
			desc = LIDAc.14.desc.5
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				NOT = { has_trait = lida_dom }

			}
			desc = LIDAc.14.desc.6
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.14.desc.7
		}
	}

			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina

			CHANGE = 1
		}

			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}

			}

		}

				desc = sex_transition.27.13.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -28002700
				}
				# 28002700: EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you push and try to stop his thrusts. It's all in vain, however, as he ignores you.\n
				desc = sex_transition.28.27.666
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 27
			}
			# defaulted to 27001510: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB

			# defaulted to 28001510: EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB

				chance = 20
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}

	}

			name = prev_event
			value = 15
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}

LIDAc.17 = {
	# MF_RUINED_ORGASM: A Firm Grasp on Your Release
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.17.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = beg
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = dismissal
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 24001710
				}
				# Handjob
				# You abruptly stop your jerking motion and slap his cock, disrupting the build up to his climax.\n
				desc = sex_transition.24.17.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 25001710
				}
				# Dom Blowjob
				# You pull back and slap his rod, disrupting the build up to his climax.\n
				desc = sex_transition.25.17.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -24002400
				}
				# 24002400: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB failed
				# 
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = { has_trait = lida_dom }
					}
					desc = sex_transition.24.24.0
				}
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait = lida_dom
					}
					desc = sex_transition.24.24.1
				}
				desc = sex_transition.24.24.2
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -24001710
				}
				# 24001710: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB -> EventsCum.MF_RUINED_ORGASM failed
				# You move to stop his climax, but realize that he did not last as long as you expected.\n
				desc = sex_transition.24.17.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -24001310
				}
				# 24001310: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB -> EventsCum.MF_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND failed
				# You place your palm below his cock, ready to receive his seed, but his tip seems to be pointing elsewhere...\n
				desc = sex_transition.24.13.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -25002400
				}
				# 25002400: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB failed
				# The potent musk of his member, inflated by the proximity of your nose to his groin, strangely captivates you and you lose this opportunity to assert more dominance.\n
				desc = sex_transition.25.24.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -25002500
				}
				# 25002500: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# The incessant invasion of his member down your throat momentarily puts you in a trance, leaving the initiative in his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition.25.25.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -25001710
				}
				# 25001710: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.MF_RUINED_ORGASM failed
				# As you try to pull back, he holds the back of your head with his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition.25.17.666
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 24
			}
			# defaulted to 24001710: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB -> EventsCum.MF_RUINED_ORGASM
			desc = sex_transition.24.17.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 25
			}
			# defaulted to 25001710: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.MF_RUINED_ORGASM
			desc = sex_transition.25.17.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_m
		}
		desc = LIDAc.17.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.17.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				NOT = { has_trait = lida_dom }
			}
			desc = LIDAc.17.desc.2
		}
		desc = LIDAc.17.desc.3
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 35
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 35
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			add_character_modifier = {
				modifier = sexually_frustrated
				years = 1
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.18
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 17
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

LIDAc.19 = {
	# MF_CUM_ON_GROIN: Snowfall on the Bushes
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.19.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {

		}
		event_background = garden
	}

		trigger = {

		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = dismissal
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = personality_bold
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 22001910
				}

		}

			trigger = {

			}
			desc = LIDAc.19.desc.3
		}

			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.19.desc.4
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.19.desc.5
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0.3
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.20
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 19
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

LIDAc.22 = {
	# MF_CREAMPIE_ON_TOP: Cherry on Top
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.22.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market

		event_background = market

		character = root
		animation = shock
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}

			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.22.desc.5
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				NOT = { has_trait = lida_dom }
			}
			desc = LIDAc.22.desc.6
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 3
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 30
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 30
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 30
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.22
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 22
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

	# MF_CREAMPIE_BREED: Something to Remember You By

			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
